title: In Conversation: Jelani Cobb on the backlash to critical race theory
itunes:title: In Conversation: Jelani Cobb on the backlash to critical race theory
description: The New Yorker’s Jelani Cobb says conservatives weaponizing critical race theory aren’t acting in good faith. He speaks with Apple News Today host Shumita Basu about his recent piece for the New Yorker about the founder of the concept, Derrick Bell. Cobb says that Bell could have predicted today’s backlash and that real critical race theory can help us understand today’s debate over false depictions of this term.
